entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:19 a.m. CDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 12:29 AM CDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:29 AM CDT Friday 5 May 2023
